author: MSNBC
title: Ohio officer cleared in shooting of teenager Ma’Khia Bryant
description: The Columbus police officer who shot and killed 16-year-old Ma’Khia Bryant last year has been cleared of any criminal wrongdoing, Ohio prosecutors announced F
content:
COLUMBUS, Ohio (AP) The Columbus police officer who shot and killed 16-year-old MaKhia Bryant last year has been cleared of any criminal wrongdoing, Ohio prosecutors announced Friday.
